DOC.brief_summary: Obesity often cite inversely relate socioeconomic status ( SES ) , although mechanisms link social status obesity well understood . Dietary restraint , physical activity , social mobility propose possible mechanism . Although evidence SES variation propose mechanism , evidence mix mostly observational . The purpose research determine one 's social position influence eat behavior . This study attempt determine use randomize , 2 parallel arm trial determine effect social hierarchy position energy intake . To prevent compromise integrity data , investigator detail exact treatment condition ( i.e. , social positioning ) data collection period . Based finding previous animal large clinical observational study , two complementary hypothesis test study . First , hypothesize low social position affect one 's perception food availability making future availability food seem less certain . This uncertainty lead increase food consumption . Second , hypothesize position power lower one 's food consumption , previous research find individual power tend east less group . Understanding social position influence food intake could help improve weight loss/maintenance intervention identify unexpected factor could limit intervention 's effectiveness .
